website_summaries.verdict: Samsung has upgraded the Galaxy Tab S2 8.0 tablet from the original Galaxy Tab S in just about every way, including a premium new design, top-of-the-line performance, and a very good camera.
cons: Many new features require additional Samsung devices

customer_reviews.title: One brilliant tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have used a much chunkier and heavier (not the Samsung S2 one) 10" tablet for a long time and thought the S2 8" would be to small. After using my wifes Samsung S2 8" for a while I have realised all I need is this, and not the house brick I have been using. The tablet is stunningly thin, light, and the screen is epic. Well chuffed.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Stil the best value tablet considering the quality of the screen

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, very thin and lightweight, great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new – came in good packaging, seals intact. It’s a quality product, very thin and lightweight Super AMOLED screen. The built in memory of 32 GB was the minimum I was looking for as Apps and NETFLIX will only download to the main storage. This can be expanded via the built in micro SD card slot (up to 128GB) provides good amount of storage space for files, movies, etc. I wanted a thin, lightweight tablet for when I travel. The 8 inch screen is perfect, just the right size and it fits into most pockets on my carryon luggage. Great battery life. Buy a lightweight case (Moko is good) and protect your investment. Well worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was I maybe expecting too much?
customer_reviews.text: The Super Amoled is very good but screen hard to see in bright light. The battery does not seem to last as long as described. Applications cannot be transferred to SD card. This device's volume is extremely poor and sometime very hard to hear. Playing music, watching a movie or TV using headphones is hard to stand with so much treble. No negative comments regarding the speed of operation though! The OctaCore does its job. Sorry for being so negative but my previous Nvidia Shield had a wonderful sound but was deadly slow . . .Well, I guess we cannot have the best of both world? Easily connected to a Samsung Smart Qled TV using the Smart View option.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 (8.0", Wi-Fi) Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black

GALAXY TAB S2 (2016, 8.0", WI-FI) - BLACK
A durable metal frame and a stylish polished finish combine to make Galaxy Tab S2 ready for any occasion. Designed for ultimate portability with a slim profile and a lightweight body. The Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 is designed to couple the productivity of a personal computer, with the portability of a Tablet. Connect your Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 with your Samsung Smart TV to share your content with the whole family, or stream your favorite TV shows to your tablet to enjoy them in any room in the house.

OPTIMAL VIEWING EXPERIENCE
The Galaxy Tab S2’s 4:3 ratio display is optimised for magazine reading and web use. Switch to Reading Mode to adjust screen brightness and change wallpaper - create an ideal eBook reading environment designed to reduce the strain on your eyes.

CLEARER, BRIGHTER IMAGES
The Galaxy Tab S2’s 8 MP camera and f / 1.9-apperture lens allow you to take brighter and crisper pictures and videos than ever before, even in low-light conditions. View your photos and videos in superb clarity on the device’s large Super AMOLED screen.



BOX CONTAINS
Tablet, power adaptor, micro USB cable, starter guide, warranty card
feature_bullets: The Galaxy Tab S2’s 4:3 ratio display is optimised for magazine reading and web use, switch to Reading Mode to adjust screen brightness and change wallpaper
It comes with a 8MP camera and f/1.9-apperture lens allow you to take brighter and crisper pictures and videos than ever before, even in low-light conditions
View your photos and videos in superb clarity on the device’s large Super AMOLED screen
Multitask like a pro with the Galaxy Tab S2 and watch HD movies while you are flicking through a digital magazine or surfing the net
Get greater security with convenient and accurate fingerprint functionality - activate fingerprint lock by pressing the home button
Sensors are Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Hall Sensor, RGB Light Sensor
